membership:
The following associations are members in Growing Media Europe: 
 
- AIPSA - Associazione Italiana di Produttori di Substrati  di coltivazione e Ammendanti 
- UPJ - UNION DES ENTREPRISES POUR LA PROTECTION      DES JARDINS ET DES ESPACES VERTS)  
- AFAÏA 
- BPF  - Belgian Potting Soil Federation  
- Lithuanian Association of Peat Producers 
- Latvian Peat Producers Association 
- Swedish Peat Association 
- RHP - Regeling Handels Potgronden 
- VPN  - Vereniging Potgrond - en Substraatfabrikanten Nederland 
- IVG Industrieverband Garten e.V. 
- UK Growing Media Association

- Events in the European Parliament (conferences, receptions)

goals__remit:
Growing Media Europe represents growing media companies in Europe and acts as the interlocutor of the industry at EU level.  
        
GME is committed to highest environmental practices in peat extraction, to the responsible use of peat and to promoting the unique properties of peat as a growing medium constituent in horticultural plant production.
